subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Rollins, Ryan Howard and Aaron Rowand homered yesterday, and Pat Burrell drove in four runs as the Philadelphia Phillies avoided their 10,000th loss again by beating the St. Louis Cardinals, 10-4, at home.
snippet: Jimmy Rollins, Ryan Howard and Aaron Rowand homered yesterday, and Pat Burrell drove in four runs as the Philadelphia Phillies avoided their 10,000th loss again by beating the St. Louis Cardinals, 10-4, at home.
